description: Unique surrogate key for this warranty record.
Reference to the related work-order asset/part line; used to attach warranty details to a specific job item. Likely a foreign key; confirm with SME.
Code denoting the kind of coverage applied (e.g., parts, labor, component). Typically links to a warranty type lookup.
Code for the meter used to measure coverage limits, such as odometer, engine hours, or cycles; ties to a meter type domain.
Identifier of the coverage provider (manufacturer, vendor, or insurer); usually references a supplier/organization record.
Calendar date when coverage ends based on time terms.
Meter reading at which coverage expires (e.g., miles, hours). Numeric threshold for the indicated meter.
Free-text notes about coverage, parts replaced, or claim context.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of user.
Date/time when a user last changed the record; values appear to be timestamps, not user IDsâ€”confirm with SME.
Username or ID of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Username or ID of the most recent editor.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
